news_header: Beyoncé endorses Kamala Harris at a rally, emphasizing her concerns as a mother and urging Americans to take action.
news_text: At a rally in Houston, Texas, singer Beyoncé endorsed Kamala Harris's presidential campaign, stating she was there as a concerned mother rather than a celebrity or politician. She highlighted the importance of freedom and urged Americans to 'sing a new song.' Meanwhile, Donald Trump is also campaigning in Texas. The text also touches on various unrelated news events, including historical injustices, emergency rescues, and natural disasters.
